InstalledItem.Name: Capston
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Experience why WillsOp is a premiere manufacturer of ship electronics with their Capston radar. Outfit your ship with one today so you know what’s nearby.

InstalledItem.Name: Eos
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RSI 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Eos quantum drive has been a staple in the RSI product line for centuries. Its original design was so perfectly fine-tuned that it has remained basically unchanged since.

InstalledItem.Name: Polar
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegis’ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.

InstalledItem.Name: Polar

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegis’ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.

InstalledItem.Name: DynaFlux
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

The DynaFlux was one of the first components A&R Co. built when they expanded their product line to more than energy weapons. Their years of experience manufacturing military-grade equipment went a long way to making the DynaFlux power plant a standout right from the beginning.

InstalledItem.Name: ForceWall
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

Want to stay in the thick of battle a bit longer? Gorgon’s ForceWall is a military-grade shield generator that’s able to absorb more damage, providing a notable uptick to your shield’s durability.
